Text:
Very nice songs! Thank you!
Long live Bulgaria!

this torrent has lived for a year.  Not bad!
Thanks for the upload, @strospliff.

BTW, TPB's tracker software sucks.  Wouldn't be much of an effort to make the encoding UTF-8, so it could show other than ascii characters, Cyrillic et all.
